info.title: Baas Pix
info.description:
**Description**: Api responsible to managing pix keys and pix transfers ## Key kind
Kind Description
`CELLPHONE` Cellphone number.
`CPF` CPF number.
`CNPJ` CNPJ number.
`EMAIL` E-mail address.
`VIRTUAL` Random key.
# Errors Account Middleware uses [HTTP response status codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_HTTP_status_codes) to indicate the success or failure of your API requests. In general, there are three status code ranges you can expect: - `2xx` success status codes confirm that your request worked as expected - `4xx` error status codes indicate an error because of the information provided (e.g., a required parameter was not provided) - `5xx` error status codes are rare and indicate an error with R4's servers ## HTTP Status code summary Extracted from [Stripe API codes](https://stripe.com/docs/api/errors) - `200 - OK` Everything worked as expected. - `400 - Bad Request` The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter. - `401 - Unauthorized` No valid API key provided. - `403 - Forbidden` The API key doesn't have permissions to perform the request. - `404 - Not Found` The requested resource doesn't exist. - `429 - Too Many Requests` Too many requests hit the API too quickly. We recommend an exponential backoff of your requests. - `500, 502, 503, 504 - Server Errors` Something went wrong on R4's end. ## Error codes Below is a list of possible error codes that can be returned:
Code Description
`INVALID_DATA` The data provided has an invalid format.
`ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND` The account informed was not found.
`PARTNERS_NOT_FOUND` Partners was not found.
`INVALID_CELLPHONE` The provided cellphone is not valid.
`INVALID_CNPJ` The provided CNPJ is not valid.
`INVALID_CPF` The provided CPF is not valid.
`INVALID_EMAIL` The provided email is not valid.
`ENTRY_LOCKED_BY_CLAIM` There is a claim with a status other than completed or canceled for the key.
`KEY_IN_CUSTODY_OF_DIFFERENT_PARTICIPANT` There is already a bond for this key with other participant and owner. It is indicated a claim of ownership.
`CLAIM_KEY_NOT_FOUND` There is no registered bond to the key being claimed.

400.description: Error with types [InvalidCPF, InvalidCNPJ, InvalidCellPhone, InvalidEmail, KeyAlreadyExists, InvalidKey, InvalidData, EntryLockedByClaim, KeyInCustodyOfDifferentParticipantError].

get.description: Get a list of claims for a specific account

parameters.name: grantor
parameters.description: Get list of claims that account is the grantor

parameters.name: claimer
parameters.description: Get list of claims that account is the claimer

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Get only claims with specif status

parameters.name: claim_reason
parameters.description: Get only claims with specif reason

parameters.name: updated_start
parameters.description: Restricts the query to a date equal to or greater than the one entered

parameters.name: updated_end
parameters.description: Restricts the query to a date equal to or less than the one entered

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number, if not informed the default will be 1
